org.nd4j.linalg.cpu.nativecpu.buffer

Class BaseCpuDataBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer.BaseDataBuffer
      • org.nd4j.linalg.cpu.nativecpu.buffer.BaseCpuDataBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AutoCloseable, DataBuffer, Deallocatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BFloat16Buffer, BoolBuffer, DoubleBuffer, FloatBuffer, HalfBuffer, Int16Buffer, Int8Buffer, IntBuffer, LongBuffer, UInt16Buffer, UInt32Buffer, UInt64Buffer, UInt8Buffer, Utf8Buffer

    public abstract class BaseCpuDataBuffer
extends BaseDataBuffer
implements Deallocatable
    Base implementation for DataBuffer for CPU-like backend
    Author:
    raver119@gmail.com
